predicate.note: This is probably only eventive in LVC usage -- otherwise it will be the gerund!

roleset.name: create a photograph
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry photograph.01, which maps to VN 25.4. Noun maps to FN Physical_artworks.

example.name: Very informative LVC usage
example.text: I took a photo of it .
